results.name: E.g.f.: Product_{k>=1} 1/(1 + x^k/k).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..449
mathematica: nmax = 20; CoefficientList[Series[Product[1/(1 + x^k/k), {k, 1, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x] * Range[0, nmax]! (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Sep 15 2017 *)
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Sep 14 2017
